name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Battle Fortress
summary:
Mobile Suit Gundam: Battle Fortress is an action strategy game, developed and published by Bandai Namco Games, which was released in Japan in 2015.

Create your own Mobile Suit team and assault the enemy fortress. There will be many playing features such as creating your own fortress and defending attacks from other players! All of the elements above can only be realized with the capability of PS Vita! So enjoy the first-rate tactical game that can easily let you control a great army, create your own strategy and base!
